name: Arkanoid (itch) (Hakansen4)
description:
I made a arkanoid game on unity. I am just trying to improve myself on game development. Because of  this if you guys see any bug in the game or if you guys have any advice please tell me by comment. It means a lot for me. Have fun :)

PC CONTROLLERS

In MainMenu

For choose a option use arrow keys and for apply the option use space or enter button.

In game

For move racket use arrow keys or A,D keys. Space button for fire a laser, throw a ball. 

Mobile Controller

You have button right and left side of the screen. You can move with button of the left side of the screen. You can apply with the B button on the left side of the screen.

FOR CODES

https://github.com/Hakansen4/Arkanoid
